price: Ka ce: "Ku yi ɗã'ã ga Allah kuma ku yi ɗã'ã ga Manzo. To, idan kun jũya, to, a kansa akwai abin da aka aza masa kawai, kuma a kanku akwai abin da aka aza muku kawai, Kuma idan kun yi masa ɗã'ã za ku shiryu. Kuma bãbu abin da yake a kan Manzo fãce iyarwa bayyananna."
arabic: قُلۡ أَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡهِ مَا حُمِّلَ وَعَلَيۡكُم مَّا حُمِّلۡتُمۡۖ وَإِن تُطِيعُوهُ تَهۡتَدُواْۚ وَمَا عَلَى ٱلرَّسُولِ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayhi mā ḥummila waʿalaykum mā ḥummil'tum wa-in tuṭīʿūhu tahtadū wamā ʿalā al-rasūli illā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
